sn29.8:1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn29.8:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā jalābujānaṃ nāgānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”ti?
sn29.8:1.5: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā jalābujānaṃ nāgānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”ti.
